Text:
function ERU_EP05_17()
    -- .転-3【3月第1週】「美少女を超えた少年」
    SaveData.Title = "美少女を超えた少年"

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024cd")

PLAY_BGM("BGM13.wav",1000,true)

    -- //BU：エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0584.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Nngh~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> That was so much funーーー<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> It was such an enjoyable time that I completely forgot about the Princess Election!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0585.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "But an election is an election! We have one minute left to accept votes, so everyone, please think hard and support your favorite～～～<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Hermes encouraged us to vote, and a minute of silence fell over the auditorium. ]])

    MSG([[ I was so focused on expressing my feelings to Arumeria that the Princess Election took a backseat. ]])

    MSG([[ Honestly, I couldn’t even imagine what the result would be. Normally, Hermes would be overwhelmingly victorious. ]])

    MSG([[ But Akira spoke of a possible miracle that could happen by involving Hermes in the appeal. ]])

    MSG([[ A loophole in the Princess Election rules that has persisted over a hundred times. I have nothing to cling to but this miracle that normally wouldn’t occur. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0586.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "It seems like the results are out! Everyone, focus on the screen! Is it Erika or me? The Princess for this year is finally, finally, finally! Going to be decided～～～～～!" ]])

    MSG([[ The moment the results appeared on the screen, a murmur spread through the venue―― ]])

    -- //CI：得票率 ？？？？？ 164
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI164a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)

    -- //SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0587.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "W-What's this, what what what? What does this mean? Could the tally still be ongoing?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2380.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "No… this is definitely correct." ]])

STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2381.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If the voting rate falls below 50%, the Princess Election becomes invalid. In other words, more than half of the people watching our appeals refused to vote." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0588.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "R-Refused…? Why…?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2382.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If you ask the audience, you’ll understand." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I turned to the audience and asked for their true feelings. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2383.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If you thought Hermes was cuter from our appeals, please applaud." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //SE：拍手（小）
PLAY_SE("SEa020.wav")

    MSG([[ From somewhere in the audience came the sparse sound of polite clapping. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0589.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Ehh!? So that means I really lost—!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2384.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Not necessarily. Now, for those who think I, Erika Ikusa, am cuter, please applaud." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //SE：拍手（小）
PLAY_SE("SEa020.wav")

    MSG([[ The applause that returned was about the same or slightly smaller than Hermes’s. ]])

    MSG([[ Neither reaction differed significantly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0590.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Even your reaction is weak, Erika!? What does this mean, what does this mean!? My head’s spinning!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2385.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Well, I wonder what it means." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2386.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Now then, for those who think both Hermes and I are cute, please applaud." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The instant I asked that―― ]])

    -- //SE：拍手（MAX）・継続
PLAY_SE("SEa019.wav",1000,true)
PLAY_SE("SEa021.wav",1000,true)
    -- //SE：歓声（MAX）・継続
PLAY_SE("SEf001.wav",1000,true)
PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav",1000,true)

    MSG([[ Great applause and cheers resonated throughout the hall. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0591.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Whoah… amazing, the cheers…" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2387.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Now it’s clear, isn’t it?" ]])


STOP_SE("SEa019.wav",1000)
STOP_SE("SEf001.wav",1000)


LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2388.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "The conclusion of this Princess Election is ‘Can’t Decide.’" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0592.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Can’t decide…?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2389.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Exactly. Cuteness is a matter of personal feeling. It’s not really something to compete over." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2390.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "That’s why the Princess Election includes a third option: cancellation due to a majority of invalid votes." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ When I realized this loophole in the rules, I wondered why such an unlikely clause was included. ]])

    MSG([[ It seemed impossible that over 50% of students would refuse to vote. At first, I thought it must be intended for the absolute worst-case scenario. ]])

    MSG([[ But if that were the case, it should trigger a rerun, not a cancellation. In fact, conditions exist to hold a rerun rather than cancel. ]])

    MSG([[ In other words, cancellation due to insufficient votes was deliberately established as another ending. ]])

    MSG([[ ‘Both are the cutest.’ The option of ‘Can’t decide’ was prepared within the ‘Four Princesses’ system. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2391.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Thank you, everyone, for choosing the option of ‘Can’t Decide’ after watching our appeals." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2392.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I am truly happy with this result because I genuinely think Hermes is cute too." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0593.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "That’s not fair! I think you’re super, super cute too, Erika!" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes hugged me, and we held hands together, turning back to the audience to speak sincerely. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2393.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Thanks to all of you, we have won. Against this world’s rule that forces us to rank superiority." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Applause and cheers continued endlessly, like eternity. Hermes and I continued waving energetically to the audience together. ]])

    MSG([[ Yuriai Private Academy might have truly become one, overcoming faction boundaries. ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes once said it was fate for two beautiful girls to compete over who’s cuter. ]])

    MSG([[ Humans naturally want to rank and compare, and that’s probably why the ‘Four Princesses’ system was created. ]])

    MSG([[ But I want to believe. That the creator of the ‘Four Princesses’ system desired an ending where two ‘Princesses’ join hands, just like Hermes and I are now―― ]])

    -- //SE：拍手（MAX）・停止
STOP_SE("SEa019.wav")
STOP_SE("SEa021.wav")
    -- //SE：歓声（MAX）・停止
STOP_SE("SEf001.wav")
STOP_SE("SEf002.wav")


PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0219.wav")
    MSG([[
    【？？？？】
 "I WON’T ACCEPT THISSSS!!!!!" ]])

    MSG([[ A furious voice thundered from behind, and Hermes and I turned around. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM19.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024ch")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,800,200)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",500,false)

    -- //BU：ネメシア（真剣）、エルメス（焦り）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ga")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MEN01ba")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)


LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2394.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "N-Nemesia-san…?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0594.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Mother!? What’s wrong!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia was standing behind us before we noticed, and she approached Hermes aggressively. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024cd")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0220.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Why are you grinning idiotically? What is your goal? What do you mean holding hands with the enemy on stage?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0595.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I-I'm not forgetting! Everyone looked anxious because of me, so I cooperated with Erika to bring smiles back!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0596.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Mother told me, didn’t she? That I was born to make everyone smile! I did my best to follow her orders!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0221.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "You IDIOT!!! I don’t care about the smiles of foolish people!" ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia sneered at Hermes’s words, placed her hands on both her shoulders, and shouted at her with a terrifying expression. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0222.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "You were born to stand at the pinnacle of ‘beautiful girls’! Making idiots smile is just a means to that end!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0223.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "W-HY do you become such a useless fool just because Arumeria disappeared!? Don’t annoy me!!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2395.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "What are you saying to your own daughter!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0224.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Daughter? So what? Outsiders should keep quiet!!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[ Unable to bear it any longer, I tore Hermes away from Nemesia. Hermes, who was usually so lively, looked completely crushed. ]])

    -- //SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav")

    MSG([[ Voices of confusion spread throughout the auditorium. Nemesia paid no mind to the strange looks directed at her. ]])

    MSG([[ There were many invited guests from outside, yet she committed such an outrageous act, clearly in a state of extreme distress. ]])


STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)


    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01db")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0597.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "M-Mother, I’m sorry… I’ll do anything, please forgive me…" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2396.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Please calm down, Nemesia. Hermes is scared." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2397.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "There are members of the press here too, right? Doing this will only choke yourself." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0225.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "...Press? Saying something so smart~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="star"> Erikaaasssss!!!!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0598.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "W-What...? Mother, will you forgive me...?" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes slipped out of my grasp and rushed toward Nemesia. My chest ached at the pitiful sight of a child begging for forgiveness from her parent. ]])

    MSG([[ Still, Nemesia did not break her malicious expression. A bad feeling crept over me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0226.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Yes, I will forgive you. But only if you hear my last request～<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0599.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Really!? I’ll do anything, anything! Because I love you so much, Mother!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

STOP_BGM(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0227.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Disappear." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0600.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "…Huh?" ]])

    MSG([[ The whole hall fell silent. ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone must have questioned their ears. ]])

    MSG([[ Still, Nemesia coldly spoke without regard for those around us. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0228.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "I told you to disappear from before me. Perform the last act of the national idol 'Hermes Himegami' amid this crowd of fools!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0229.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "This will forcefully change this world! Hyahaha! Hyahahahahaーーーーーー!!!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2398.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "W-What are you saying!? Hermes, please step back! This person is not in their right mind!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I stepped between Nemesia and Hermes, trying to interrupt. ]])

    MSG([[ But―― ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0601.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "…Okay, I understand." ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav",1000,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0602.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I’ll do as Mother said<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Because Mother has never once been wrong before<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2399.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hermes…!? What on earth are you――" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //BU：ネメシア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

    -- //SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa016.wav")
WAIT(1000)
    MSG([[ Before I could stop her, Hermes ran off from my side. ]])

    MSG([[ The audience, who had been watching up to that point, suddenly erupted in chaos. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- //SE：騒ぐ声
--PLAY_SE("SEf017.wav")
    -- //SE：どよめき
--PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav")

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,750,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB08aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,-450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB09aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(75,-750,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0196.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "W-We have to stop Hermes-sama!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0197.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Let’s drag that old woman off the stage! We absolutely won't forgive this!!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：モブ男性、モブ女性×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,750,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,-450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(75,-750,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("suit-woman_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Woman in Suit】
 "This is breaking news!! The rift between a popular idol and her mother! This is juicy!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("roughman_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Man in Casual Clothes】
 "Hey guys, get the cameras ready! We’re chasing after Hermes!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("suit-man1_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Man in Suit】
 "It’s me. Immediately impose reporting restrictions on all outlets. Nemesia Himegami has gone rogue... Hermes is finished as a content." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024cd")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ The commotion rapidly spread through the entire auditorium. ]])

    MSG([[ I had stood there stunned, but finally snapped out of it and started moving to chase Hermes. ]])

    -- //BU：ネメシア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0230.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "It’s useless. It’s impossible to catch Hermes in this chaos." ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia called after me from behind. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0231.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "No matter how much you struggle, some things are impossible. You’re just a child who doesn’t know anything. It’s time you accepted it!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2400.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...They said the same thing when I infiltrated Yuriai Private Academy, that it’s impossible, impossible." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2401.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "But thanks to Akira and everyone else, I was able to become a ‘beautiful girl’ who could stand shoulder to shoulder with Hermes." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2402.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Until the very end, I will keep struggling! Don’t lump me together with you, who gave up on everything!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",500,false)
    -- //SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa016.wav")
WAIT(1000)

    MSG([[ I turned my back on Nemesia and burst into a run. ]])

    MSG([[ In the panic raging through the auditorium, the crowd jostled so much that I lost sight of Hermes. ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes answered “yes” when told to disappear. Where on earth was she headed? ]])

    MSG([[ A sinking feeling in my chest wouldn’t stop.]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 0,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_18")
end
